channel.title: Homes on MeelGroup
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on MeelGroup

item.description: Meel Group Welcome to the Meel Group’s web page. We are situated at National University of Singapore.

item.title: People
Contact
item.description: Kuldeep S. Meel Assistant Professor Computer Science Department, School of Computing National University of Singapore Please consult my calendar before suggesting a meeting time.

item.title: Openings
item.description: We are looking for highly motivated Ph.D. students, postdocs, and interns (with time commitment of at least 6 months) in our group. If you are a student at NUS, feel free to drop by Kuldeep’s office or schedule a meeting with him. (See his calendar). Otherwise, please send him an email with your CV if you are interested. If you are looking for an internship/postdoc, make sure your subject contains the word “olleh” and you should include reviews of two of my papers (published in the previous 3 years).
